TopicTitle: What i would like to see in the next update.

Articles.Content: I know its completely useless but in a near update i would like to have some kind of roster to our crew. like the number of flight done , where, walking on what planet. Also experience gained and if we can give them some medal... completely useless...but fun.
That's a nice suggestion, I'd love to see it too. you should put it in the suggestions forum.
Fix the fact that many kerbals cannot walk properly on top of moving rover and the fact that they cant walk on centrifugal gravity generators either.
